title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A classic 35mm film camera, highly valued by collectors for its craftsmanship and precision.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: A legendary electric guitar, known for its warm tone and smooth playability. A true piece of rock history.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Apple’s first mass-produced computer, the Macintosh 128K, a pivotal piece of computing history.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: Iconic dive watch with automatic movement and stainless steel casing. A collector’s favorite.

title: First Edition ‘The Great Gatsby’ by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A rare first edition of Fitzgerald’s timeless masterpiece, preserved in excellent condition.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: An authentic Eames lounge chair — the epitome of comfort and modern design elegance.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: A stunning screen print inspired by Banksy’s street art, symbolizing hope through the beauty of a flower bouquet.
